hero.subtitle: REDEFINING INTELLIGENCE
hero.description: We bridge the gap between digital intelligence and physical action. BotAI builds the brains for the machines of tomorrow.

about.title: We Are BotAI
about.p1: At BotAI, we believe the future belongs to the convergence of physical and digital intelligence. Our name is our mission: Bot + AI. We don't just build software; we build the cognitive engines that power the next generation of robotics and autonomous agents.
about.p2: Founded on the principle that automation should be intelligent, adaptive, and seamless, we are pioneering solutions that allow machines to understand, learn, and interact with the world around them with unprecedented precision.
about.bot_desc: Advanced robotics integration capable of executing complex physical tasks. From warehouse logistics to precision manufacturing, our systems are designed for the real world.
about.ai_desc: State-of-the-art neural networks that provide perception, reasoning, and decision-making capabilities. Our AI doesn't just follow instructions; it solves problems.

careers.title: Join the Revolution
careers.subtitle: Build the future with us.
careers.no_openings_desc: We are not actively hiring at the moment, but we are always on the lookout for exceptional talent. If you believe you can contribute to our mission, check back soon or follow us for updates.
careers.value1_desc: Work on the cutting edge of robotics and AI.
careers.value2_desc: Create technology that changes the physical world.
careers.value3_desc: Grow with a team of world-class engineers and researchers.
